scripts.package: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('npm run build && git checkout -b deployment && cp -f package.json src/loader.cjs build && git add . && git commit -m \" build \"')"
scripts.prepush: if [[ ${npm_config_server} ]]; then echo "\033[30mbuilding production output...\033[0m" && node -e "require('child_process').execSync('npm run package')"; else echo "\033[32mskipping package step\033[0m"; fi;
scripts.push: if [[ ${npm_config_server} ]]; then args=--force && server=${npm_config_server}; fi; node -e "require('child_process').execSync('git push $server $args')"
scripts.postpush: if [[ ${npm_config_server} ]]; then echo "\033[31mrunning git reset\033[0m" && node -e "require('child_process').execSync('npm run postdeploy')"; else echo "\033[33mskipping git reset...\033[0m"; fi;
scripts.postdeploy: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('git reset --hard HEAD~ && git switch development && git branch -D deployment')"
